description:
Planet Coaster - Cedar Point’s Steel Vengeance (v1.3.6.45104+DLC) (RUS|ENG|MULTi9) [Repack]

Year of manufacture: November 17, 2016
Genre: Strategy
Developer: Frontier Developments
Publisher: Frontier Developments
Publication Type: RePack
Language: Russian / English
Language of voice: - || -
Tabletka: STEAMPUNKS

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 (64-bit versions);
Processor: Intel i5-2300 / AMD FX-4300
Memory: 8 GB
Graphics Card: nVidia GTX 560 (2GB) / AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB)
Sound Card: compatible with DirectX® 11
Free hard drive space: 7gb

Description:
Planet Coaster is a realistic amusement park simulator. 
The game opens almost endless possibilities before the players. 
Create a park with a clean sheet, changing it to the smallest detail, 
watch your visitors, watch their desires and surprise them. 
Your task is to create a park that will not leave anyone indifferent.
Planet Coaster - the spiritual successor to the series of managers Rollercoaster Tycoon, 
in which players are engaged in the management of the amusement park.

Repack features:
- Based on the release of STEAMPUNKS
- Do not cut / Do not recoded
- Game archives are not opened
- The game version 1.3.6.45104
- DLC:

- Planet Coaster - Back to the Future ™ Time Machine Construction Kit
- Installed crack from ZOG (Version 1.1.4 from SidCitron.DLC not translated)
- A shortcut is displayed for launching the Russian version and a shortcut for the English version. (In Russian the start is registered)
- Installation time 10 minutes on the HDD (Depends on the computer)
- The repack uses the pZlib library from Razor12911
